meta.title: Wishub - Create wish lists and share with you friends

header.subtitle: Create wishlists, reserve gifts and present what truly matters.

events.title: Any type of events
events.text: Select from predefined types or set your own.

share.title: Share
share.text: Share wishlist via link or send invitation using email.

empty.title: You don't have any wishlists yet
empty.subtitle: Create your first wishlist and start to share it with your friends.

empty.title: You don't have any reserved gifts yet
empty.subtitle: To reserve a gift, ask your friend for a link to his wishlist.

public.label: Public
public.description: Change the list visibility to other users.

name.label: Name
name.description: The name usually used in public lists.

toggle.label: Public
toggle.description: If public, you can share a link to your list.

welcome.title: Please, confirm your email
welcome.subtitle: We've sent you confirmation code on your email. If you didn't get it, please check your spam folder or request a new one

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Join today ahd start to share wish lists.

reset_password.title: Reset your password
reset_password.subtitle: You get an email with a link to reset your password

set_password.title: Set new password
set_password.subtitle: Set new secure password for your account

password.too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters.

name.too_long: Name must be at most 255 characters.

token.invalid: Invalid token. Try to requesta a new one.
token.expired: Token is expired. Try to request a new one.

wishes.required: Please add at least one wish.

wish_name.too_long: Wish name must be at most 255 characters.
wish_name.unable_to_fetch: Не удалось получить название желания. Пожалуйста, введите название самостоятельно.

verification_code.invalid: Invalid verification code. Try to request a new one.
verification_code.expired: Verification code is expired. Try to request a new one.
verification_code.too_short: Verification code must be at least 6 characters.

validation.unexpected_error: Something goes wrong. Please try again later.

confirm_email.title: Confirm email on
confirm_email.description: Paste code below in confirmation form
confirm_email.comment: This email was sent automatically by wishub.app because your registered account. If you didn't, there's nothing to worry about, you can safely ignore it.

reset_password.title: Reset your password
reset_password.description: Someone recently requested a password change for your Wishub account. If this was you, you can set a new password here
reset_password.comment: If you don't want to change your password or didn't request this, just ignore and delete this message.

toasts.reset_link_was_sent: Reset link was sent to you email. Check your inbox.
toasts.list_was_changed_to_public: List is now public. You can share a link to it with your friends.
toasts.list_was_changed_to_private: List is private now. Only you can see it.
toasts.gift_was_unreserved: You removed reserve from this gift.

update_list.title: Update list
update_list.description: Make changes to your list here. Click save when you are done.

remove_list.title: Are you absolutely sure?
remove_list.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your list and all wishes in it.

update_wish.title: Update wish
update_wish.description: Make changes to your wish here. Click save when you are done.

remove_wish.title: Are you absolutely sure?
remove_wish.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your wish.

error_boundary.title: Something went wrong
error_boundary.subtitle: Please try to refresh the page or come back later. We already notified about this issue and will fix it as soon as possible.
